txt.en:
Your Kinship is now the proud owner of a Kinship House. Be sure to pay any necessary weekly upkeep (Premium Housing upkeep is waived for VIPs). You can pay up to 26 weeks in advance via the housing management panel.

You can see the address of your Kinship House at any time in the House panel which can be accessed via the Start menu under 'Character'. Drop in to meet with kinsmen and plan your next adventure!

A Kinship House gives all members a discount to purchases from the vendors in your neighbourhood as well as a new skill which allows you to travel instantly to your Kinship House.
